mapper.insert: insert into `order`(orderNumber, merchantName, customerName, space, duration, carLicense, price, startDate, endDate, qrCode, state, orderType) values (#{orderNumber}, #{merchantName}, #{customerName}, #{space}, #{duration}, #{carLicense}, #{price}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{qrCode}, #{state}, #{orderType})
mapper.select: select * from `order` where customerName = #{username} and endDate > now() and state = '进行中'
select * from `order` where merchantName = #{merchantname} and carLicense = #{car} and endDate >= now() and state = '进行中'
